1535730.name: Wordeous - Yeşilçam Pack I
1535730.description:
Did you played all the words which comes with the starter pack again and again? Do you want to play more? Unlock 100 new words with this Green Pine Pack! By getting this free pack you will have access to 100 new words in "GREEN PINE" category in addition to the starter pack words. This Green Pine Pack will give you hours of gameplay. New words, new possibilities!

Green Pine is a name given to Turkish Cinema. This free DLC includes words related to Turkish Cinema. Because of the nature of the Green Pine, this pack only includes Turkish words.
